content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <metadata xml:lang="en"> <Esri> <CreaDate>20140508</CreaDate> <CreaTime>13500800</CreaTime> <ArcGISFormat>1.0</ArcGISFormat> <SyncOnce>TRUE</SyncOnce> </Esri> <dataIdInfo> <idAbs>This map presents information about the terrestrial ecosystems in South America, and was developed as part of the United States Geological Survey\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds (USGS) effort to model the distribution of terrestrial ecosystems. Additional information and access to this data is available at http://rmgsc.cr.usgs.gov/ecosystems/.</idAbs> <searchKeys>  <keyword>ecosystems</keyword>     </searchKeys> <idPurp>This map presents information about the terrestrial ecosystems in South America.</idPurp> <idCredit/> <resConst> <Consts> <useLimit/> </Consts> </resConst> <idCitation>       <resTitle>South America Terrestrial Ecosystems and Base Layers</resTitle>     </idCitation>   </dataIdInfo> <Binary> <Thumbnail> <Data EsriPropertyType="PictureX"></Data> </Thumbnail> </Binary> </metadata>
